Resistance.help: Leather Jackets gives the Enforcer some resistance to Lethal Damage. He can fire a Burst and Heavy Burst with his Sub-machine Gun. He is also a very good leader and can buff the Defense of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Maneuvers.

Brawl.help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Maneuvers.help: This Thugs Defense to all attacks is improved due to good leadership in Maneuvers from your Lieutenant.
Maneuvers.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Defense with good {PowerName}.

UZI_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.
UZI_Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

UZI_Heavy_Burst.help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.
UZI_Heavy_Burst.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

UZI_Cone_Blast.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

Tactics.help: This Thugs Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good Leadership in Tactics from your Lieutenant.
Tactics.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Equipped.help: This Enforcer has been Equipped. He now has Dual 9mm UZIs. He can also increase the Damage of all nearby thugs with his Leadership skills in Tactics.

Dual_UZIs.help: Your Defense has been reduced by fire from the UZI.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Blast_Clip.help: You are getting pelted by an exploding clip of ammo.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Assault.help: This Thugs damage is improved due to good leadership in Tactics from your Lieutenant.
Assault.victimHit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Upgraded.help: This Enforcer has been Upgraded. He can now fire both UZIs in a massive spay of lead. He can also throw an ammo clip and blast it in mid air. His leadership in Assault can now increase the Accuracy of all nearby thugs.
